page.title: 10LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: IRON AGE FORTS There are two iorn age forts in our block.They are LLETY-LLWYD and ALLT-GOCH.These iron age forts are built on high ground with a slope down each side,on this slope are three fences.There is a road leading up one side of the slope with a gate on it. Iron age forts were built on high ground so that they could see the enemy coming and had the advantage when they were attacked. { {CELTS}lived in these forts on the top level and kept their animals in the middle section.There is a theory in this area that when one fort was attacked they would light a fire on the top to warn a fort nearby of the approaching enemy.The CELTS used iron to make weapons and tools,they were some of the first farmers.They made roads on high ground to avoid bogs.
